queries.query:
from(bucket: "power-usage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "pi-zero-w2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "power-usage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "volts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "pi-zero-w2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "system-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system-metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "pi-zero-w2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

queries.query:
from(bucket: "system-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system-metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem_avail" or r["_field"] == "mem_used" or r["_field"] == "mem_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "pi-zero-w2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
